title: The X Factor: Celebrity line-up - meet the full cast of famous contestants
text:
The X Factor is back, but this time with a twist: all the contestants are celebrities.

Spin-off show The X Factor: Celebrity, launching on Saturday 12 October, will see a roster of famous faces competing to impress judges Simon Cowell, Nicole Scherzinger and Louis Walsh.

From soap stars and influencers to reality TV favourites and sporting heroes, 14 acts will be taking to the stage.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

The show is being touted as a “brand-new take on the nation’s most talked about music talent show” – even though The X Factor: Battle of the Stars, which essentially had the same format, aired in 2006.

Dermot O’Leary will be hosting proceedings, and you can meet all the celebrity contestants below…

Click through to see them.

Shape Created with Sketch. The X Factor: Celebrity line-up Show all 14 left Created with Sketch. right Created with Sketch. Shape Created with Sketch. The X Factor: Celebrity line-up 1/14 Martin Bashir ITV 2/14 Ricki Lake ITV 3/14 Jenny Ryan ITV 4/14 Victoria Ekanoye ITV 5/14 Megan McKenna ITV 6/14 Hayley Hasselhoff ITV 7/14 Jonny Labey ITV 8/14 Olivia Olson ITV 9/14 Kevin McHale ITV 10/14 The Islanders ITV 11/14 Try Star ITV 12/14 Cole and Edwards ITV 13/14 Max and Harvey ITV 14/14 V5 ITV 1/14 Martin Bashir ITV 2/14 Ricki Lake ITV 3/14 Jenny Ryan ITV 4/14 Victoria Ekanoye ITV 5/14 Megan McKenna ITV 6/14 Hayley Hasselhoff ITV 7/14 Jonny Labey ITV 8/14 Olivia Olson ITV 9/14 Kevin McHale ITV 10/14 The Islanders ITV 11/14 Try Star ITV 12/14 Cole and Edwards ITV 13/14 Max and Harvey ITV 14/14 V5 ITV

The X Factor: Celebrity launches on ITV at 8.40pm on Saturday 12 October.
description: The X Factor is back, but this time with a twist: all the contestants are celebrities.
